Content:
FTL-Method: Rift
Ship-module: Rift Generator AND Starmap

Stations: Rift detector
The huge starmap module permits a ship
with a rift generator to jump anywhere it the galaxy. The energy cost
depend on the density of the ship. The spin up is quite long and can be
detected with rift detectors. This is a late game tech. The energy cost
is independent of the distance. There is no real maximal jump distance.
